pr_title: put lock on applicable openapi endpoints

timeline.bodyText: @Parameter(hidden = true) should be all you need.
timeline.author: garyluu

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it is the only necessary part but I added the other items because I wanted it to match many of the newer endpoints for consistency.
replies.author: NatalieEO

replies.bodyText: name is fine but unnecessary, but in = ParameterIn.HEADER is just wrong.  You can always change the other ones.
replies.author: garyluu

replies.bodyText: Maybe elaborate, there is probably something going on with ParameterIn.DEFAULT that you're referring to.
replies.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: Was still curious about the explanation here. Also does the swagger-ui "try it now" operation work with in = ParameterIn.HEADER missing? Please confirm, thanks!
replies.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: Yeah, tried a few random endpoints and the try it now is still working
replies.author: NatalieEO

timeline.message: put lock on applicable openapi endpoints
